name: Swarm of Bats
description: A chaotic, flurry of small, nocturnal creatures characterized by their ability to swarm. They possess a keen sense of echolocation for navigation in darkness.
memorable: Their overwhelming numbers can confuse and disorient foes, creating chaos on the battlefield.
goals: Typically found in areas rich in insects or blood, they swarm to overwhelm their prey.
relations: Often found in caves, ruins, or forests, where they might share habitats with other nocturnal or insectivorous creatures.
strengths: High mobility and the ability to occupy the same space as other creatures, making them effective in tight quarters.
weaknesses: Very low Strength makes them ineffective in physical confrontations, relying instead on numbers and chaos.
attacks: Uses Bites to attack, capable of significant damage when striking in numbers.
most_powerful_ability: Echolocation allows them to navigate and attack even in complete darkness, although it is hindered when deafened.
senses: Can detect prey through blindsight and has keen hearing, providing advantage on perception checks related to sound.
skills: Has proficiency in Perception checks, particularly those that rely on hearing.
additional_information: The swarm is immune to many conditions, maintaining effectiveness despite various attacks.
It occupies a unique niche as both a nuisance and a source of confusion in combat.
Unlike individual bats, a swarm collectively exerts greater influence in battles.
They cannot regain hit points or benefit from temporary hit points.
The swarm's chaotic movement can create panic among foes.
test_queries: tiny bats that overwhelm with numbers
swarm of bats in caves and forests
swift bats that create confusion and panic
